document.full_text: jered weaver struck out a career-high 15 and los angeles took advantage of a costly error by toronto center fielder rajai davis to beat the blue jays.
document.title: roundup: weaver's strikeouts lead angels to victory
lines_and_colors: jered weaver struck out a career-high 15 and los angeles took advantage of a costly error by toronto center fielder rajai davis to beat the blue jays.
